targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

options.content:
{{ package }}

Summary

{{ content }}

License

{{ license }}

Additional Information

To learn more, visit the project's repository or home page, displayed (if known) under 'Detected URLs.'
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
WITH package_metrics AS (select package_url, key, value from metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id where package_url='${PackageURL}')

SELECT
  (select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.homepage_url') AS homepage_url,
  (select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.repo_url') AS source_repo,
  (SELECT CASE
      WHEN EXISTS ((select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.description'))
        THEN (select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.description')
      ELSE 'A summary could not be found for this project.'
  END AS content),
  (SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN EXISTS ((select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.license' and value != '' and value != 'Other'))
        THEN (select CONCAT('This project was released under the ', value, '.') from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.license')
      ELSE 'No license was detected.'
    END AS license
  ),
  (SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN EXISTS ((select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.name'))
        THEN (select value from package_metrics where key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.name')
      WHEN EXISTS ((select regexp_matches(package_url, '[.*pkg:npm.*]*[.*pkg:general.*]*') from package_metrics))
        THEN (select substring(regexp_matches(package_url, '(?<=\:).*')::text, 2, length(regexp_matches(package_url, '(?<=\:).*')::text)-2) from package_metrics)
      WHEN EXISTS ((select regexp_matches(package_url, '.*pkg:github.*') from package_metrics))
        THEN (select substring(regexp_matches(package_url, '(?<=\/).*')::text, 2, length(regexp_matches(package_url, '(?<=\/).*')::text)-2) from package_metrics)
      ELSE 'This package could not be found'
    END AS package
  )

panels.description: URLs found in this project's metadata.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
  case m.key
    when 'openssf.calc-metadata.project-url' then 'Repository'
    when 'openssf.calc-metadata.isitmaintained-url' then 'Is It Maintained?'
    when 'openssf.bestpractice.detail-url' then 'OpenSSF Best Practices Assessment'
    when 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.homepage_url' then 'Project Home Page'
    else m.key
  end as key,
  m.value as value
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key like 'openssf.%url%' and
  m.value like 'http%' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}' and
  m.key != 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.repo_url' and
  m.key != 'openssf.criticality.raw.url'
ORDER BY key desc

panels.title: Detected URLs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m.properties->>'Review-Date' AS review_date,
  m.properties->>'Issues-Identified' AS issues_identified,
  m.properties->>'review-url-relative' AS review_url_relative
FROM package p left join metric m on p.id = m.package_id
WHERE p.package_url = '${PackageURL}' and
      m.key = 'openssf.security-review'

SELECT
  100.0 * value::numeric as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.criticality_score' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  value::integer as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.stars' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  value::integer as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.recent_releases_count' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

panels.description: How many years since this project was first created.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  value::numeric / 12.0 as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.created_since' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

panels.title: Project Age

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  value::integer as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.contributor_count' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  value::numeric as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.updated_since' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  value::integer as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.dependents_count' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT value as metric
    FROM metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
    WHERE
      m.key = 'openssf.criticality.raw.criticality_score' and
      p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'
    ) THEN 0
  END AS criticality_date

WITH badge as (SELECT m.value
    FROM metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
    WHERE
      m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.badge_level' and
      p.package_url = '${PackageURL}')
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * from badge where badge.value = 'gold') THEN 0
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * from badge where badge.value = 'silver') THEN 1
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * from badge where badge.value = 'passing') THEN 2
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * from badge where badge.value = 'in_progress') THEN 3
  END AS value

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 4
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.dynamic_analysis_fixed_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 4
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.static_analysis_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 4
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.dynamic_analysis_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 4
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.static_analysis_fixed_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 0
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.know_secure_design_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 0
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key in ('openssf.bestpractice.raw.crypto_published_status',
		        'openssf.bestpractice.raw.crypto_keylength_status',
		        'openssf.bestpractice.raw.crypto_working_status',
		        'openssf.bestpractice.raw.crypto_random_status'
		  ) and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  to_date(value, 'YYYY-MM-DD')::text as metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.achieved_passing_at' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 0
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.know_common_errors_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 0
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.vulnerability_report_process_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'Met' THEN 3
    WHEN 'N/A' THEN 2
    WHEN '?' THEN 1
    WHEN 'Unmet' THEN 0
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.bestpractice.raw.require_2fa_status' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

panels.description:
✓ → no severe reviews

✘ → at least one severe review

? → no reviews

targets.rawSql:
WITH reviews as (
  SELECT m.properties->>'Issues-Identified' AS issues_identified
  FROM package p left join metric m on p.id = m.package_id
  WHERE p.package_url = '${PackageURL}' and m.key = 'openssf.security-review'
)
SELECT 
  CASE
    WHEN EXISTS (select * from reviews where issues_identified = 'Severe') THEN 1
    WHEN EXISTS (select * from reviews where issues_identified != 'Severe') THEN 0
  END AS value

panels.title: Security Reviews

targets.rawSql:
WITH scorecard AS (SELECT value FROM metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
  WHERE m.key like 'openssf.scorecard.raw.%' and p.package_url = '${PackageURL}')
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM scorecard HAVING COUNT(*) < 8) THEN -1
    ELSE (SELECT (count(*) / 0.12) FROM scorecard WHERE value = 'true')
  END as score

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'true' THEN 0
    WHEN 'false' THEN 1
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.scorecard.raw.active' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'true' THEN 0
    WHEN 'false' THEN 1
  END AS metric
FROM
  metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE
  m.key = 'openssf.scorecard.raw.frozen-deps' and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT
  CASE value
    WHEN 'true' THEN 0
    WHEN 'false' THEN 1
  END AS metric
FROM

SELECT m.value
FROM metric m left join package p on m.package_id = p.id
WHERE

  and
  p.package_url = '${PackageURL}'

SELECT

FROM

WHERE

SELECT

    WHEN 'false' THEN 1
  END AS metric
FROM

WHERE

SELECT

SELECT

list.definition:
SELECT SUBSTRING(purls.package_url, 5, LENGTH(purls.package_url)-4) as package_url
FROM
(select distinct p.id, package_url FROM package p) as purls
left join
(select p.id, m.value from package p left join metric m on p.id = m.package_id where m.key like 'openssf.criticality.raw.stars') as stars
on purls.id = stars.id
ORDER BY CASE when stars.value is null then 1 else 0 end, CAST (stars.value as INT) desc
list.label: Select Project
list.name: PackagePath
list.query:
SELECT SUBSTRING(purls.package_url, 5, LENGTH(purls.package_url)-4) as package_url
FROM
(select distinct p.id, package_url FROM package p) as purls
left join
(select p.id, m.value from package p left join metric m on p.id = m.package_id where m.key like 'openssf.criticality.raw.stars') as stars
on purls.id = stars.id
ORDER BY CASE when stars.value is null then 1 else 0 end, CAST (stars.value as INT) desc

list.definition: SELECT package_url FROM package WHERE package_url like '%${PackagePath}'
list.name: PackageURL
list.query: SELECT package_url FROM package WHERE package_url like '%${PackagePath}'
